nodes.title: Eastern western note classifier
nodes.description: We were able to analyze a simple series of musical sounds and determine each of their respective note simultaneously..

nodes.title: Automatic Medicine Pill Dispenser
nodes.description: An IoT based project reminds elderly people with their pills with buzzer.

nodes.title: Smart Car Parking System
nodes.description: Parking Slots booking with Smartphones. Car enters by showing RFID card, Presence of car is detected by IR sensors. Real time updates on server

sig_details.name: Rovisp
